faq.name: faq
faq.label: FAQ
faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Get answers to common questions about our subscription plans.

items.title: Why subscribe?
items.description: Your support helps us keep improving the product, and you get valuable benefits: watermark-free outputs, priority queue, faster generation, full privacy, and ad-free experience.

items.title: Can I upgrade or cancel?
items.description: Anytime! You can upgrade or cancel in one click from your account settings page. Your subscription runs through the end of your billing term, with no long-term contract.

items.title: Can I get a refund?
items.description: We currently do not offer refunds. Please review the plan details before purchasing. For exceptional cases, contact support@shipfire.app.

items.title: Do I get higher quality with paid plans?
items.description: Yes. Standard and Premium unlock more features and benefits, including priority queue, watermark-free outputs, commercial use rights, and more.

items.title: Does my subscription include API access?
items.description: We don't have a public API at the moment but plan to offer one in the future. Feel free to reach out at support@shipfire.app with your requirements.

items.title: Can I get help using the product?
items.description: Yes! Contact us at support@shipfire.app. Paid users receive priority technical support, and we'll respond as quickly as possible.
